data.title: List of Essendon Football Club players
authors: Contributors to Australian Rules Football Wiki
data.meta_description: This is a list of Essendon Football Club players who have made one or more appearance in the Australian Football League (AFL), known as the Victorian Football League (VFL) until 1990. Essendon were one of the foundation clubs for the inaugural VFL season in 1897.
data.text:
This is a list of Essendon Football Club players who have made one or more appearance in the Australian Football League (AFL), known as the Victorian Football League (VFL) until 1990. Essendon were one of the foundation clubs for the inaugural VFL season in 1897.

[]

Key Order Players are listed in order of debut Seasons Includes Essendon only careers and spans from when a player was first listed with the club to their final year on the list Debut Debuts are for VFL/AFL regular season and finals series matches only Games Statistics are for VFL/AFL regular season and finals series matches only and are correct to the end of the 2017 season Goals ^ Currently listed players
